preconditions: User is at the login page (https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login)
User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User enters username (tomsmith) and password (SuperSecretPassword!) in the respective fields
System validates the username and password against the database
a. System displays a success message
b. User is redirected to the secure area
a. System displays an error message
User enters incorrect username or password:
a. System displays an error message
User leaves the login page without logging in:
a. System does not redirect the user to the secure area
postconditions: If login is successful, user is authenticated and can access the secure area
If login fails, user remains on the login page and is not authenticated.
